If you travel to or live in Barcelona, this is the Asian restaurant to try.  The selection is unimaginably diverse, with multitudes of shell fish, traditional Asian stir fried dishes, and more accompaniments then you can fit on a plate; it is a Buffet.  Flavors of many different cuisine are offered, and if you cannot find something on the buffet there is a hibachi grill with plenty of fresh vegetables and proteins to create your own dish. Also Ice Cream, Fruit, Dessert is offered.  The Peking Duck is on point. Remember no tap water, drinks are per item; bottle of water, soda by can, they do have wine by glass.Service could be friendlier, but it is very efficient.  Lunch price is a great deal, slightly less selection than dinner I would imagine.  High Quality hand wipes. Like any Eatery, always check for Quality of Ingredients and Sanitation when dining
